Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cleveland Cavaliers are considering trading for Chicago Bulls center Jalen Smith due to the Bulls' unclear direction and Smith's potential to fill the Cavs' need for a long-term frontcourt reserve.
Others: Jalen Smith averaged 9.9 points and 5.5 rebounds over 17.2 minutes a night on 59.2/42.4/69.2 shooting splits with the Indiana Pacers in the 2023-24 campaign.
Trade Speculation: The Cleveland Cavaliers are considering trading for Jalen Smith from the Chicago Bulls.
Team Analysis: The Cleveland Cavaliers need a real backup center to fill out their frontcourt rotation.
Trade Value: Jalen Smith would have solid value in a trade.
Contract Details: Jalen Smith signed a three-year deal with the Chicago Bulls in free agency.
Team Performance: The Chicago Bulls are unclear about their direction.
